Literature.Title: Novel peptides from skins of amphibians showed broad-spectrum antimicrobial activities.
Literature.Author: Wang Y, Zhang Y, Lee WH, Yang X, Zhang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus IS10#(MIC=10µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus IS37#(MIC=5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli IS37#(MIC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli IS117#(MIC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli IS218#(MIC=50µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047(MIC=20µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=10µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae IS59#(no activity data),Shigella dysenteriae(MIC=5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CMCCB 1010(MIC=10µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IS350#(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=5µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=2.5µg/ml)
